Token.Abstract: This document describes a class that overrides NSAssertionHandler.
Logs (using C4Log) an error message that includes the name of the function, the name of the file, and the line number.

Parameter.Name: fileName
Parameter.Abstract: The name of the source file.

Parameter.Name: line
Parameter.Abstract: The line in which the failure occurred.

Parameter.Name: format
Parameter.Abstract: A format string followed by a comma-separated list of arguments to substitute into the format string. See Formatting String Objects for more information.
The variables for the format string

Token.Abstract: Logs (using C4Log) an error message that includes the name of the method that failed, the class name of the object, the name of the source file, and the line number.

Parameter.Name: selector
Parameter.Abstract: The selector for the method that failed The function that failed.

Parameter.Name: fileName
Parameter.Abstract: The name of the source file.

Parameter.Name: line
Parameter.Abstract: The line in which the failure occurred.

Parameter.Name: format
Parameter.Abstract: A format string followed by a comma-separated list of arguments to substitute into the format string. See Formatting String Objects for more information.
The variables for the format string
